data.oai_dc:dc: NOAA Daily Surface Meteorologic Data at NCDC Flamingo Ranger Station (ID-083020), South Florida from January 1951 to Jun 2009
The National Climatic Data Center's (NOAA) daily mean, maximum, and minium air temperatures and daily precipitation collected at Flamingo Station (Coop ID- 083020).
Everglades|South Florida|air temperature|precipitation|Florida Coastal Everglades LTER Program|1951|2009|Flamingo Ranger Station
